content: finial a sock pattern by rachael mcdaniel a sturdy sport weight sock pattern designed to fit women s us shoe sizes 6-8 materials - main color one skein 100g/272 yd of briggs & little sport in light ​ grey - contrast color one skein 100g/272 yd of briggs & little sport in ​ dark grey - set of four 2 75mm us 2 double-pointed needles - scissors - tapestry needle gauge 28 stitches and 40 row = 4 inches 1 abbreviations - mc main color ​ - cc contrast color ​ - k knit ​ - p purl ​ - st st stocking stitch knit all stitches ​ - k2tog/k3tog knit two together/knit three together ​ - p2tog/p3t0g purl two together/purl three together ​ - w&t wrap and turn ​ - on knit side with yarn in front slip_stitch from left needle to right needle move yarn to back then slip_stitch back to left needle turn work - on purl side with yarn in front slip_stitch from left needle to right needle move yarn to back then slip_stitch back to left needle turn work move yarn to back pattern cuff using cc cast on 56 stitches on three needles join for working in the round work k1 p1 rib until cuff measures 1 5 leg join mc cut cc work 4 row st st in mc join cc work chart a below in st st 2 cut cc work 9 row st st in mc on 10th row k 28 separate these stitches evenly on two needles heel join cc work heel - k 27 w&t - p 26 w&t - k 25 w&t - p 24 w&t continue in same manner until p 10 w&t next two row - k to first wrapped stitch pick up wrap k2tog w&t - p to first wrapped stitch pick up wrap p2tog w&t continue working heel - k to first wrapped stitch pick up both wraps k3tog w&t - p to first wrapped stitch pick up both wraps p3tog w&t continue in same manner until all wraps have been picked up and 28 stitches remain on the needle ending on a purl row turn foot with knit side facing join mc cut cc k across 28 heel stitches do not turn continue knitting across remaining 28 stitches continue in st st in the round until foot measures 5 1/2 or desired length toe same as heel above finishing using three-needle bind-off or kitchener stitch close toe weave in ends block and wear
